title: Hugh Jackman Almost Played Bond, And Other Things You Might Not Know About The ‘X-Men’ Star
text:
Hugh Jackman Almost Played Bond, And Other Things You Might Not Know About The ‘X-Men’ Star 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
In the past 15 years, we’ve seen Hugh Jackman work with robots in Real Steel and fight vampires in Van Helsing , play an obsessed magician...
